note.p: Honours: CB 1912; KCB 1916; GCB 1919; GCMG 1929; GCVO 1934; Baron 1939
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1964 vol 10 pp 137-146, plate, by B F J Schonland
References: William McGucken, 'The Royal Society and the Genesis of the Scientific Advisory Committee to Britain's War Cabinet, 1939-1940' in NR 1978-9 vol 33 pp 87-115
